pages.text: 23|60|arau yisakale dana karaibalagiya bastu bhita-kampita hrdayata dana karae, e'i karane ye, te'omloke nija pratipalakara ocarata pratyarartanakarai.
23|61|Te'omloke'i kalyana sadhanata kharadhara karae arau te'omloka tata agragami haya.
23|62|Arau ami kako tara sadhyatita dayitbara boja arpana nakarao arau amara ocarata ache ene ekhana kitapa yito satya byakta karae arau sihamtara prati akano an'yaya karaa naha’ba.
23|63|Baram e'i bisaye sihamtara antara ajnanatata acchanna, iyara bahirae'o sihamtara arau karma ache yibora sihamte karai ache.
23|64|Arasesata yetiya ami sihamtara bilasi byaktisakalaka sasti di'om tetiya sihamte artanada karai uthe.
23|65|Sihamtaka koraa ha’ba, ‘aji artanada nakaraiba, niscaya tomaloke amara phalara paraa kono sahaya napaba’.
23|66|Arasye mora ayatasamuha tomalokara ocarata tilarata karaa haichila, kintu tomaloke ulati pichaphalehe guci gaichila
23|67|dambhikatarae e'i bisayata arthahina galpa-gujaba karai tomaloke raati atibahita karaichila.
23|68|Kiya sihamte e'i bani samparke cinta-garaesana nakarae? E'i karane neki ye, sihamtara ocarata enekuraa bastu ahiche yito sihamtara purbapurausasakalara ocarata aha nachila
23|69|athaba sihamte nija raachulaka ciniba paraa na'i buli asbikara karaiche neki
23|70|na'iba sihamte e'ito kaya neki ye, e'om unmadanagrasta? Nahaya, baram te'om sihamtara ocarata satya lai ahiche, arau sihamtara adhikansa'i satyaka apachanda karae.

23|71|Arau satya yadi sihamtara kamana-basanara anugami ha’lehemtena tente akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata thaka sakalo bastu bisrnkhala hai parailehemtena. Baram ami sihamtara ocarata lai ahicho sihamtara sanmana sambalita yikara (kora'ana) kintu sihamte sihamtara e'i upadesabanira (kora'anara) paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya.
23|72|Athaba tumi sihamtara ocarata kono pratidana bicaraa neki? (Jani thoraa) tomara pratipalakara pratidane'i sraestha arau teraemi sraestha jiraikadata.
23|73|Arau niscaya tumi sihamtaka sarala pathara pine'i ahbana karai acha.
23|74|Niscaya yisakale akhiraatara prati imana posana nakarae, sihamte'i sarala pathara paraa bicyuta
